document_data.name: Makred
document_data.mainbody: '''Makred the Foul''' was an [[orc]] shaman of [[Gruumsh]] of the [[Many-Arrows]] kingdom and one of the lieutenants of [[Vansi Bloodscar]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Abilities: Makred fought in a manner that was common among the Eye of Gruumsh shamans that served the One-Eyed God.
document_data.Possessions: He wore a pair of magical bracers and wielded a [[spear]] in battle.
document_data.History: During the Many-Arrows orcs' occupation of the [[Neverwinter/River District|River District]] of [[Neverwinter]], Makred took up residence within the [[Cloak Tower]], along with Vansi Bloodscar and her other lieutenants. When [[adventurer]]s in service to Captain [[Janros]] of the [[Neverwinter Guard]] finally penetrated the tower in the {{YearlinkName|1479}}, they confronted and slew Makred the Foul in the Alchemy Chamber.
